attributes.content: Transmission went through!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Captain? Do you copy?
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: I'm here! It's me! What's your status?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Most of us are fine. We're trapped under this building at the moment, but we found an access hatch.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: We'll regroup with you if we find another exit.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: We disabled the restart function. Rest assured, we've got a very defensible position. Make your way here and you won't have to worry about getting caught flat-footed.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Bluishsilver, she's...
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Gah!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...No, no, Rosmontis! Wait!
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Focus on the mission... don't come for us! You promised us before we set out!
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: But!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Keep your promise! We wouldn't have followed you into Chernobog without it.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Remember our talk back when we joined your team?
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Listen to me, Rosmontis... we talked about how elite operators and their teams are all different.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: You can do so much. You Arts are so strong. There's not much we can do for you in a fight.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: But when you can't handle the burden, we'll share it with you. Just like Amiya and the other elite operators.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: But you're my team!
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Calm down!
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Bluishsilver's last wish...
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Was that we help you grow as a warrior, not a soldier, and not a weapon.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Captain, you get your job done. We'll make it out of here safe.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Listen, Rosmontis. This might be hard to do. But it's what Bluishsilver wanted.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: 'You're not just an elite operator, you're Rosmontis. We all love you, not just your team, but Rhodes Island and the Infected, everyone who hates loss and destruction... we all love you.'
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: So, Captain, 'Think about what 'Rosmontis' would do, okay?'
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Over and out. Tell Amiya hi for us.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: Don't leave me. Please come back.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: We will.
attributes.name: Rosmontis Squadmember

attributes.content: They cut the transmission.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What's the situation?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, Amiya. We lost one member of the engineering team, but the rest are safe for now.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Rosmontis... We need a little more firepower. The guerrilla mortar team needs supplies. We'll ambush them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, after Ace died, what did you think?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Oh!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You don't have to tell me if you don't want to. But I want to know.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Sorry, I don't want to think too much about it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You want to run away too?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: No, it's just not the time to face up to it. Tears are for the end, when it's all over.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I only remember the very end, I was thinking...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That I didn't want to let him, or any of our Rhodes Island operators, die in vain.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Recon Operator, tell me where. I'm going.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Reunion is totally out of control. Watch yourself.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Because we're their enemy?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Because everything is their enemy. Without an enemy to fight, sometimes people make their own.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What are you worried about? Vanguard group, attack!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Sniper group, fall back!;Defender operators, cover them!;Casters, cease fire!

attributes.content: Roger! Form up and reload!
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Roger! Hold fast! Don't let them cut off the corridor!
attributes.name: Defender Operator

attributes.content: Stop casting! Watch for friendly fire!
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: No further! Too scary.
attributes.name: Herdified Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Don't hit! Pain! Pain everywhere.
attributes.name: Herdified Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: That's an unpleasant infection symptom.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: They are no longer human.;......;More disturbing than the Infected mutants in Lungmen.

attributes.content: If you want to ask if I worry about Rosmontis, Amiya, and their teams...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have to confess, there's no use worrying.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We settled on the plan, and it all runs on a predesigned track. If you squeeze onto someone else's rail, you'll just end up derailing two trains.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The herd doesn't look like it's pushing up!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.options: Stay focused! We want to pass through, not wipe them out!

attributes.content: Clear them in waves. We don't have the capacity to take on an entire battlefield.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I'm worried about Amiya.;I'm worried about Rosmontis.;I'm worried about the operation.

attributes.content: Amiya is a mature leader and an excellent fighter. She knows the team, the operation, and our objectives.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Rosmontis is a powerhouse and the elite operator best supported by her team. She clears her mission objectives cleanly and decisively, as long as the operation utilizes her properly.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Chernobog is in the midst of a raging storm, and given the circumstances there's not much worrying about the situation can accomplish.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The most important thing we can do for them is accomplish our own team's strategic objectives.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: That's it?! ;......;Isn't that a little cold?

attributes.content: I don’t think so.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: She's through all seven training segments and passed every test given to her. There were three in which she showed particular promise.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have no faith in casters like this. Kalt'sit, I pride myself on my skill with Arts, and I hope to help others with it.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: That's not what Rosmontis is. Her Originium Arts art not those that serve to benefit mankind.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: I want her to fight, but for one consideration.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If Rosmontis spent her whole life in the greenhouse, her outburst once reality shatters her beautiful world would be catastrophic.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If you can't do it, I will.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: Pith!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You and Amiya have too much faith in the future. One misstep and someone else's future is gone forever.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: Before we make a judgment like that, we have to at least try.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm worried about a future that's beyond saving.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: For now, I'll have her serve as an elite operator. Not in the future, but now.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Right now, we teach her, polish her, forge her strength into shape, hold her to the highest standards, and watch her stand firm in the face of Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Until there is nothing in the world that can shake her.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Only then will she be free of the terrible fate the Columbians set out for her. Only then can she lead her own life.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That is my goal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I knew you'd say something like that, Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: But who's responsible for her?
attributes.name: Pith

attributes.content: I need you to work with me. I need the elite operators on this together.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And I promise you, I stake my life on it. We will see this through.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A war cast in warmth and kindness is a much more dangerous form of war.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I don't want to speak of such horrible cruelties, even if my fears should never come to pass.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Amiya and Rosmontis are in the care of Rhodes Island herself, and more directly the elite operators who take responsibility for them.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Further, they are the core of the squad's strategy, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Trust in them, and you trust in yourself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hey, Hawk, did you see that?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: How could I not?
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: Shhh. Don't give us away.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Then why did you ask me? You're the one making noise.)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (I said shhhh. You don't want the Captain to chew you out.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (She can't talk, how would I know if she's chewing me out, or if it's just you pretending for her?)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (I wouldn't do that.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (I know.)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (I mean...)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Enough. I know you want to ask about this stuff.)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (You've got all these weapon and armor cases, all this machinery laid out all nice. If it was just laying around I'd say I came up with a million Victorian pounds or so.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (I bet you two big ones that's Ursus stuff. I saw goods like this when I was smuggling around Laval. This is brand spanking new.)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (You got the Central Corps, but other units can't have had anything like this more than... Hmm, maybe five years?)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (You think it makes any sense that Reunion could've just looted all this equipment?)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (You mean the guys who go around swinging pipes? I don't think they'd even know how to grease it.)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (What about the guerrillas? They're ex-Ursus Army.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (How long ago did they desert? Those big, heavy metal guys would sink if you pushed them into a lake.)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (Even if they managed to bring some logistics units with them all those years ago, they'd probably all be dead by now.)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (Think about it. With the stuff they're using now, it's a miracle they can keep their plates wiped clean.)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (Let them get their hands on these weapons? I doubt they'd even know which end to point at the enemy.)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (You're making them sound like a bunch of idiots.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (Ignorance and idiocy aren't the same thing. Logistics is skill as much as it's knowledge. The guerrillas aren't dumb, but the odds that they'll come across some Infected logistics officers eager to run off with them are pretty slim.)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (Saving an Infected officer from execution... that's a tall order.)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (Look... The serial number's been filed off. Sure, a deserter might do that, but you know who else might...?)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: (You might do it if you were trying to trick somebody.)
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: (It wasn't done very clean. Just looking at it I can tell what kind of file they used. Looks like somebody was short on time.)
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: But the most important thing for now...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: We have to tell them, and quick. Whether or not it's useful info.
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: I just hope we're not too late. Captain, should we have Radian tell Amiya's team? Or go report it direct?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: We should keep Reunion and the weird looking guys busy back here? Got it.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: We've got bogeys closing on our position.
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: Mantra, you on it? Just make them forget what they're doing. No need to fabricate some orders or turn them into gibbering morons or whatever...
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: Conserve your strength. If we run into Reunion, we'll need you to defuse the situation.
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: Hm? Hm.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: 'Good. Be careful.'
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Hawk

attributes.content: Okay... And it's good to send, Captain. Here.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: 'The Ursus Army is in the core city.'
attributes.name: Elysium
